display_name: Overall supine Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at 0% desaturation
description: Supine Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at all desaturations [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp + hnrbp + carbp + canbp + oarbp + oanbp + marbp + manrbp)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
